title: Private credit investors pull $7bn from Wall Street’s biggest funds
description: Funds managed by Apollo, Ares and Blackstone were among those hit by redemption requests in late 2025
content: Funds managed by Apollo, Ares and Blackstone were among those hit by redemption requests in late 2025
